block.biomeswevegone.skyris.desc: A foreign type of tree found by that hare.
block.biomeswevegone.yellow_sakura_sapli: A type of tree that seems to be popular with weebs.
block.biomeswevegone.white_sakura_saplin: A type of tree that seems to be popular with weebs.
block.create.hand_crank.desc: A hand-turned crank to power things.
block.create.mechanical_saw.desc: A saw utility. Good for cutting down trees fast.
block.minecraft.birch_sapling.desc: A nice, white type of tree.
block.minecraft.cactus.desc: That kind of hurts, but it gets you green dye.
block.minecraft.cherry_sapling.desc: A type of tree commonly used by weebs.
block.minecraft.dark_oak_sapling.desc: A darker variant of Oak. I think.
block.minecraft.dirt.desc: An essential building block for farming.=
block.minecraft.oak_sapling.desc: An oak tree. The easiest type to farm.
block.minecraft.obsidian.desc: An element for nether portals. Really hard to break...
block.minecraft.player_head.desc: The disembodied head of a player.
block.minecraft.powder_snow.desc: A block that can freeze and entrap players.
block.minecraft.spruce_sapling.desc: A spruce tree. An easy type to come across.
block.minecraft.sugar_cane.desc: A good item for making Paper.
block.minecraft.torch.desc: A simple utility that brings light.
block.minecraft.tnt.desc: A simple bomb. Are these Taph's?
item.minecraft.apple.desc:
A healthy snack.
It didn't fall too far from the apple tree...
item.minecraft.bone.desc:
A good treat for a good boy.
When crushed up, it makes a good fertilizer.
item.minecraft.bone_meal.desc: An amazing fertilizer for grass and trees.
item.minecraft.diamond.desc: A solid ore for making tools.
item.minecraft.diamond_axe.desc: Good for cutting trees and heads.
item.minecraft.diamond_pickaxe.desc: A good utility for mining Obsidian.
item.minecraft.diamond_shovel.desc: A tool for the long haul.
item.minecraft.dried_kelp.desc:
A sea-based item for eating.
Kind of stale and hard to eat...
item.minecraft.ender_pearl.desc:
A teleportation tool great for getting around places.
Causes harm when teleporting...
item.minecraft.iron_ingot.desc:
A disposable ore for throwaway tools.
Also good for making blocks!
item.minecraft.milk_bucket.desc: A simple drink to take off the buzz.
item.minecraft.powder_snow_bucket.desc: The new MLG on the block.
item.minecraft.wheat_seeds.desc:
A simple farming item.
Throw it away, or keep it?
item.minecraft.writable_book.desc: A diary to write your thoughts in.
item.minecraft.written_book.desc:
A book that somebody already signed off.
What lore does it hold?
item.aether.blue_berry.desc: A nice snack. It seems to come from another universe...
item.aether.zanite_ore.desc: Amazing gems that speed up as they wear down.
item.aether.zanite_shovel.desc: Amazing shovel that speed up as they wear down.
item.aether.gravitite_shovel.desc:
A very efficient mining tool.
Makes dirt, gravel and sand go bye bye if you right click!
item.origins.orb_of_origin.desc: A shiny orb that lets you change your family lineage.
